IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE SUBSIDIZED RENTAL HOUSING TO LOW-INCOME INDIVIDUALS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROVIDE SUBSIDIZED RENTAL HOUSING TO LOW-INCOME INDIVIDUALS.
IRS990.Desc: UNITY HOUSING, INC. OWNS AND OPERATES A 60 UNIT APARTMENT COMPLEX FOR LOW- INCOME INDIVIDUALS IN PARKERSBURG, WEST VIRGINIA. ALL EXPENSES ARE ATTRIBUTED TO THE FACILITY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: IN 2009, THE CORPORATION SOLD ITS 122 UNIT APARTMENT COMPLEX SERVING LOW- INCOME ELDERLY INDIVIDUALS IN MORGANTOWN, WEST VIRGINIA. THE FOLLOWING YEAR, THE CORPORATION SOLD ITS 91 UNIT APARTMENT COMPLEX IN FAIRMONT, WEST VIRGINIA. THE CORPORATION HOLDS A RESIDUAL RECEIPTS NOTE FROM THE MORGANTOWN PROJECT SALE AND CASH FROM THE FAIRMONT PROJECT SALE. THE CASH AND ANY PROCEEDS FROM THE NOTE ARE SUBJECT TO RESTRICTIONS ON ITS USE LIMITED TO LOW INCOME HOUSING WITH PRIOR APPROVAL BY THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CORPORATION'S BUSINESS OPERATIONS, A 60 UNIT HOUSING COMPLEX, IS MANAGED BY HUMAN RESOURCE DEVELOPMENT & EMPLOYMENT, INC., AN ORGANIZATION EXEMPT FROM TAXATION UNDER I.R.C. SECTION 501(C)(3) AND RELATED TO THE CORPORATION THROUGH COMMON CONTROL (SEE SCHEDULE R). THE MANAGEMENT AGENT PROVIDES BOOKKEEPING ASSISTANCE; PREPARES MONTHLY FINANCIAL REPORTS; REVIEWS MONTHLY OCCUPANCY REPORTS; MONITORS CASH COLLECTIONS; AND CONTROLS DISBURSEMENTS.
THE ORGANIZATION'S MEMBERS ARE COMPRISED OF ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND OTHER PERSONS INTERESTED IN THE PURPOSE OF THE CORPORATION.
THE MEMBERS MEET ANNUALLY TO ELECT THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND TRANSACT SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THEM.

THE MEMBERS, BY A MAJORITY OF THE MEMBERS VOTING, MAY REMOVE ANY MEMBER FOR CONDUCT DEEMED PREJUDICIAL TO THE ORGANIZATION. THE MEMBERS, BY A MAJORITY VOTE OF ALL MEMBERS OF RECORD, MAY REMOVE A DIRECTOR WITH OR WITHOUT CAUSE.

THE ORGANIZATION'S PRESIDENT AND/OR SECRETARY-TREASURER REVIEWS THE RETURN WITH THE INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT FOR COMPLETENESS AND ACCURACY WHEN IT IS PRESENTED FOR SIGNATURE. THE OFFICER(S) INFORM THE EXECUTIVE BOARD AT ITS NEXT MEETING THAT THE RETURN HAS BEEN FILED; A PUBLIC INSPECTION COPY HAS BEEN MADE AVAILABLE IN THE ORGANIZATION'S MAIN OFFICE; AND A COPY HAS BEEN POSTED TO THE ORGANIZATION'S PRIVATE SECURE WEB-PORTAL FOR BOARD MEMBERS. THE OFFICER(S) WILL ALSO TYPICALLY DISCUSS WITH THE BOARD ANY SIGNIFICANT CHANGES OR OBSERVATIONS THAT COME FROM THE RETURN PREPARATION.
THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FORM 990 ARE AVAILABLE FOR INSPECTION IN THE MANAGEMENT AGENT'S MAIN OFFICE DURING NORMAL BUSINESS HOURS. ADVANCE NOTICE IS REQUESTED.

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THOMAS P MARONEY UNITY APTS INC
